ppl org Manual Page

Name

ppl org - Set the organization name of a contact

Synopsis

ppl org <contact> <organization>

Description

Stores the given <organization> as the name of the organization to which the specified <contact> belongs. The <contact> parameter must correspond to the ID of an existing contact in the address book. The <organization> may be any string value.

Examples

ppl org jdoe "Free Software Foundation"
